page.title: 07SCHOOLS
page.content: {WARNINGLID SCHOOL Warninglid School was built around 1885.The building looks like it was once a chapel with its bell tower.The school consists of 73 children, 4 teachers, 1 cleaner and 2 cooks. Most of the pupils live outside Warninglid, so travel to school by either car or bike;some walk.The school has its own swimming pool, sandpit and climbing frame.The field on the side of the school was bought from a farmer. Most children from this area go on to Warden Park Comprehensive in Cuckfield {STAPLEFIELD PLACE SCHOOL In 1950 Staplefield Place School was opened for handicapped children age 5-17.In this school the children have the same modern equipment as any other school.
